PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to the number of Charms to all enemies. When received damage, remove half of the Charms.
Flip a card, you change the card's state from face-down to face-up or vice versa.
A Marked card is highlighted and can be recognized when face-down.
An actual card cannot be Flipped.
A Face-down card is hidden and cannot be recognized. Its cost, name, picture, and text are not visible.
Gems are Unplayable cards that are like Power cards, but they are discarded when disobey some rules.
A Face-up card is the same as usual cards, which can be recognized.
